executable.title: ScanConvertPhasedArray3D
executable.description: Scan convert beam-line data from a 3D phased-array ultrasound probe.
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH Prostate Cancer Assessment grant 1R41CA196565-01

double.name: azimuthAngularSeparation
double.label: AzimuthAngularSeparation
double.description: The number of radians between each azimuth unit

double.name: elevationAngularSeparation
double.label: ElevationAngularSeparation
double.description: The number of radians between each elevation unit

double.name: radiusSampleSize
double.label: RadiusSampleSize
double.description: The number of Cartesian units between each unit along the R

double.name: firstSampleDistance
double.label: FirstSampleDistance
double.description: The distance to add to the radius
